sentences: Ütleme talle, et ta peab täna homme tööle minema.
Kui ma ütlen, et see on hea mõte, siis ma arvan, et see on tõesti hea.
context: The word "ütleme" is the first person plural form of the verb "ütlemine", which means to say or tell. It is commonly used in Estonian language to express a suggestion or proposal, similar to the English phrase "let's say".
